entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:25PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Very Hot Over The Eastern Interior Through Monday... ...High Water On The Tanana River Into Next Week... The Eastern Interior will become very hot this weekend with isolated afternoon thunderstorms.
